title: ...Curtain. - Sensei to Kiyoraka ni Dousei
description: A collection of short stories:1. Living Purely Together with SenseiHiyori Okamura is a new mathematics teacher at a high school she graduated from. She still loves Shibasaki, a chemistry teacher who she loved as a student. One day, it happened that Hiyori couldn't use her room, so she moved to Shibasaki's room in the same apartment house, and began to live there. A curtain divided the room in two, and Hiyori and Shibasaki...!?2. Love DuetHonda Ema works with and is attracted to Sawaki Koutaro. Honda plays the piano and is taught by Sawaki's little sister. But due to an accident Sawaki will be teaching her.3. Sweet Days for You, Too4. Impassioned DrawingTwo co-workers passionate about their work keep their relationship a secret because co-workers are not allowed to date in their company5. Entreaty Guidance
author: Kyoko Mizutani
